features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control (ADMIN, operator). Handles login, logout, session management.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing parking system overview, real-time occupancy, vehicle statistics, and system health metrics.

features.name: Vehicle Entry Management
features.description: Handles vehicle entry registration with plate validation, vehicle type selection, timestamp recording, and ticket generation.

features.name: Vehicle Exit Management
features.description: Processes vehicle exits with automatic fee calculation based on parking duration, generates receipts, handles payment confirmation.

features.name: Reports Generation
features.description: Generates daily, weekly, monthly reports with data exports (PDF, Excel). Includes occupancy metrics, revenue data, and vehicle statistics.

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin interface for managing system users, including creation, modification, deletion, and role assignment.

features.name: Audit & Logging
features.description: Tracks all system actions, user activities, and changes. Maintains audit trail for compliance and security purposes.

features.name: Data Visualization
features.description: Interactive charts and graphs showing parking metrics, occupancy trends, revenue patterns using Chart.js and ng2-charts.

features.name: PDF Generation & Download
features.description: Creates and downloads PDF documents including tickets, receipts, and reports using jsPDF and HTML2Canvas.

features.name: Data Export
features.description: Exports data to Excel format using XLSX library for reports and data analysis.

features.name: Database Backup & Recovery
features.description: Handles database backups in SQL format and JSON format, with recovery procedures for disaster recovery.

features.name: Settings & Configuration
features.description: System configuration management including parking fees, capacity settings, working hours, and general system preferences.

features.name: Navigation & Routing
features.description: Angular routing configuration with protected routes, lazy loading, and route guards for access control.

features.name: HTTP Client & API Interceptors
features.description: Centralized HTTP communication with JWT token injection, error handling, and request/response interceptors.

features.name: Form Validation
features.description: Client-side form validation for vehicle entry, user management, and settings forms with real-time feedback.

features.name: API Health Check
features.description: Monitors backend API health status including database connectivity and system availability.
